name: Pro PPC Ltd
description:
Pro PPC have been awarded the accolades of being rated in the top 1% for Google Adwords in Elance worldwide (based on PPC intelligence testing); have consistently been graded at 98% for client performance by Google; have been positioned in the top 2% of all Google Partners worldwide (based on client performance); and have been placed in top positions in all three Google Partner competitions.
Our growing team of highly talented and skilled individuals are experts in analysing, strategising and managing paid search accounts with varied budgets across the Google Search and Display Networks, right through to other paid channels such as Facebook, YouTube and LinkedIn. We not only specialise in getting our customers the lowest possible cost per click, but getting our clients the lowest possible cost per customer acquisition. In addition, our creative experts build bespoke landing pages that work to target the right traffic. These methods ultimately lead to the continued growth of business and improvement of overall marketing strategy.
